abstract: New, full-color e-readers are about to hit the market — with dueling technologies.
snippet: New, full-color e-readers are about to hit the market — with dueling technologies.
lead_paragraph: BLACK-AND-WHITE movies have their film noir appeal, yet it’s glowing color that rules on most consumer displays these days, with one exception: the pages of e-book readers. There, color is still supplied the old-fashioned way — not by filtered pixels, but by readers’ imaginations.

headline.main: Reading E-Books in All the Colors of the Rainbow
headline.print_headline: Reading E-Books in All the Colors of the Rainbow
